title: Looking for some people to help me get out of BRONZE and into silver by this thursday!
body:
So im currently B2 was B1 but I got demoted, I've been losing alot of games because of the people ive been playing with, if there are atleast 1,2,3 or 4 people willing to help me get out of bronze, I'll be in your debt



ADD ME OR REPLY:

replies.body: you have a 19% win ratio dont think you deserve a higher rank lol
I know, I keep losing because of the teams that i get put with, like for example my supp was zilean how kept ulting himself

> [{quoted}](name=Hodgkinson,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=zLqATIK1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-12T06:33:00.976+0000)
>
> I know, I keep losing because of the teams that i get put with, like for example my supp was zilean how kept ulting himself

well you seem to feed very hard most games, its not exactly your teams fault
Thats true but are you gonna help me or just tell me Im bad?

> [{quoted}](name=Hodgkinson,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=zLqATIK1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-12T06:33:00.976+0000)
>
> I know, I keep losing because of the teams that i get put with, like for example my supp was zilean how kept ulting himself

Zilean is a great champ
Add me in game and I will give it a shot and while we are at it let you know if it really is you or other players who are letting you down.
